snippet.title: Tethered is coming to Oculus and Vive with immersion enhancing motion controller interaction!
snippet.description:
Our magical virtual reality strategy game is coming to Windows PC with a simultaneous launch on Oculus and Steam VR, date tbc. Tethered debuted on PlayStation VR in October 2016 to critical acclaim, bringing innovative and original gameplay to the embryonic platform.

Read more in our developers blog:
http://www.secretsorcery.com/tethered-launches-pc
